column1: Earlier this week I joined Hands of Christ Duluth Co-Op to box & deliver Thanksgiving meals and supplies for families in need.   They’re doing incredible work for Georgians — and I’m going to continue fighting to secure additional COVID relief and help them in their mission. https://t.co/je83jgfOpD

When COVID hit I immediately went to work for Georgians.  @CollinsforGA used the pandemic to promote himself and attack our outstanding Governor @BrianKempGA.  I will continue using my business experience to help reignite our economy and deliver relief to hardworking Georgians. https://t.co/sWFgHtAloY

Putting America First means punishing those who threaten our safety.   China threatened the safety of MILLIONS around the world by covering up COVID-19 and @realDonaldTrump and I are working to hold them accountable. https://t.co/0nqiod6FyS
COVID stood NO chance against @realDonaldTrump! https://t.co/GtNPOHkDqF

Telemedicine has never been more important than during COVID-19. I got a first-hand look at the amazing work the team at the @GACyberCenter is doing to expand access to telemedicine in Georgia and across the country. #gasen #gapol https://t.co/7OJ3d0xdCm
.@GovKemp is right — we’re in this together!   -Wear a mask. -Wash your hands.  -Social distance. -Follow the guidelines.   We can get through this. https://t.co/Q0HLK0WxC6 #gapol

We should obviously pursue new solutions to aid #COVID19 response but we should not jeopardize our national security doing so. And equipment made by Dahua — a notorious Chinese surveillance firm — poses serious risk. https://t.co/2b1SUoabua #gapol #gasen

Today I toured @helpendhungerga in Savannah & teamed up with @GeorgiaGuard to pack meals for those in need. They’re doing great work helping those impacted most by #COVID19! #gapol #gasen https://t.co/0UkcthV3Og
